com.mygdx.game

Class SmallPotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.mygdx.game.LevelObject
          • com.mygdx.game.Item
            • com.mygdx.game.SmallPotion

  • public class SmallPotion
extends Item
    This class is representative of a health potion object that the character picks up to turn small and fit in small gaps
